attributes.action: NHS staff who are immune should not be obliged to vaccinate against Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: UK Government should recognise existing science. NHS staff with post-infection immunity to SARS-CoV-2 should not be obliged to vaccinate against Covid-19.
attributes.background:
There is a scientific proof that SARS-CoV-2 infection induces robust, antigen-specific, long-lived immunity: 
https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-021-03647-4 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mzOf6Cj3T-8
